General.Name: Derimod Konfeksiyon Ayakkabi Deri Sanayi ve Ticaret AS
General.Description: Derimod Konfeksiyon Ayakkabi Deri Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. provides leather and fashionable products for men and women in Turkey. Its products include leather jackets and coats, bags, cross body bags, loafers, backpacks, waist bags, shoulder bags, briefcases, clutch and portfolio products, purses/wallets, wristlets, gloves, slippers, casual and classic shoes, shoe care products and accessories, belts, boots, sports shoes and sneakers, heels, and flat and heeled sandals. It also operates stores. Derimod Konfeksiyon Ayakkabi Deri Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1974 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.
General.Address: Gürsel Mahallesi Imrahor Caddesi, Istanbul, Turkey
